name: WP Travel MapQuest
author: WP Travel

sections.description:
WP Travel Mapquest is a map display plugin which is a fantastic way of showing your business location. It is a simple map addon to WP Travel plugin which can be used in place of Google Map. This plugin can replace the use of google map with its own features of locating the desired locations.

  • Check detail info at “wptravel.io” by WEN Solution.

Plugin features:

  • Zoom Level setting
  • Mark the location by adding the value of latitude and longitude
  • Search feature
  • And more under development …

Our Other Addons:

  • WP Travel Utilities
  • WP Travel Express Checkout
  • WP Travel Stripe Chekout
  • WP Travel Instamojo Checkout
  • WP Travel Razorpay Checkout
  • WP Travel Tour Extras
    View all addons

Our Themes:

  • Pleased by Theme Palace.
  • Pleased Pro by Theme Palace.
  • Tourable by Theme Palace.
  • Tourable Pro by Theme Palace.
  • Travel Gem by WEN Themes.
  • Travel Gem Pro by WEN Themes.
  • Travel Log by WEN Solutions.

Customization and Flexibility

WP Travel Mapquest plugin is very flexible and highly customizable. There are a number of hooks and filters which makes plugin really flexible from the developer’s point of view. There are no of options which add further more flexibility in the plugin.

Dedicated Support and Documentation

We have an entire team of happiness engineers ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum.

Also you can checkout WP Travel MapQuest documentation.
sections.installation:
Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  • Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  • Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  • Select wp-travel-mapquest.zip from your computer
  • Click ‘Install Now’
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  • Download wp-travel-mapquest.zip
  • Extract the wp-travel-mapquest directory to your computer
  • Upload the wp-travel-mapquest directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
There is something cool you could add…

Nice, send us a request on Support page and let us know. We are always looking for ways to improve our plugins.

WP Travel Mapquest documentation and user guide

For easy usage of the plugin, please go through our official documentation below:

Documentation page

Where can I get support?

If you have any queries regarding the plugin then you can ask for help in Support page
sections.changelog:
3.0.0

Release Date: 29th June, 2023

  • Fixed longitude and latitude not display.
  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 6.2.2.

2.1.6

Release Date: 15th November, 2021

  • Fixing minor issues

2.1.5

Release Date: 15th November, 2021

  • Fixing minor issues

2.1.4

Release Date: 15th November, 2021

  • Fixing minor issues

2.1.3

Release Date: 15th November, 2021

  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 5.8.2

2.1.2

Release Date: 30th August, 2021

  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 5.8.

Fixes:
* Location name saved on location search.

2.1.1

Release Date: 25th February, 2021

  • Critical error fixes on WP travel setting page.
  • Mapquest searched places not updating on trip page fixes.
  • Compatibility update upto 5.6.2

2.1.0

Release Date: 15th October, 2020

  • Compatibility update upto 5.5.1

Enhancements:

  • WP Travel MapQuest admin settings updated to WordPress Block layout.
  • Compatible with the WP Travel v4.3.0

2.0.2

Release Date: 24th September, 2020

  • Lat, Lng issue fixes. Display error while adding wrong lat, lng.

2.0.1

Release Date: 25th Aug, 2020

  • Compatibility testing.

2.0.0

Release Date: 10th June, 2020

  • Compatibility with WP Travel 4.0.0
  • Minor Fixes.

1.0.3

  • Compatibility tested upto WordPress 5.2.2.

1.0.2

  • Fix: Settings Issue
  • Fix: Map rendering Issue
  • Minor Fixes

1.0.1

  • New Feature: Option added to WP Travel Map Selector.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
